description: HTTP and gRPC RED metrics visualization for Grafana Beyla

panels.description: the slowest remote procedure calls (RPC) in your application sorted by response time percentile

targets.expr: sort_desc(topk by(http_route, service_name) (5,  max by (http_route, service_name) (histogram_quantile(0.95,  (sum by(http_route, service_name, le) (rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_bucket{service_name="${Service}"}[$__rate_interval]))))))) > 0

panels.title: Slowest HTTP Routes (P95)

panels.description: average and top percentiles for both HTTP and gRPC traffic
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: number of requests per second, faceted by its HTTP or gRPC return code
panels.title: Request rate

panels.description: percentage of 5xx HTTP responses or non-zero gRPC responses over the total of the requests
panels.title: Error rate

panels.description: average and top percentiles for both HTTP and gRPC traffic
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: number of requests per second, faceted by its HTTP or gRPC return code
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: percentage of 5xx HTTP responses or non-zero gRPC responses over the total of the requests
panels.title: Error rate

list.description: Source of the metrics (e.g. Prometheus source)
list.label: Data source
list.name: datasource

title: Beyla RED Metrics
